# Nami Thai Massage

> Licensed massage therapist specializing in traditional Thai massage, sports therapy, and holistic wellness services in North Park, San Diego, California.

## Business Information

- Name: Nami Thai Massage
- Type: Massage Therapy Studio
- Location: 3055 University Avenue, San Diego, CA 92104
- Neighborhood: North Park
- Service Area: North Park, Hillcrest, University Heights, Normal Heights, South Park, Balboa Park Area
- Hours: 9am - 8pm, 7 days a week
- Booking: https://bookme.pocketsuite.io/book/nami-thai-massage
- Website: https://namithaimassage.com
- Instagram: @naomi_nam246

## Services Offered

### Signature Packages
- Thai Style Signature (90 min) - $200: 60 min therapeutic massage + 15 min head massage + 15 min traditional Thai stretching
- Thai Style Deluxe (120 min) - $250: Full Thai Style experience with extended stretching and aromatherapy
- Relaxation Package (90 min) - $185: Swedish massage combined with aromatherapy and hot stones

### Therapeutic Massage
- Swedish Massage (60/90 min) - $115/$165: Gentle flowing strokes for relaxation and stress relief
- Deep Tissue Massage (60/90 min) - $130/$185: Targeted pressure for chronic tension and pain relief
- Sports Massage (60/90 min) - $149/$199: Performance-focused massage for athletes and active individuals
- Hot Stone Massage (60/90 min) - $145/$200: Heated basalt stones for deep muscle relaxation
- Prenatal Massage (60 min) - $130: Safe, comfortable massage for expectant mothers

### Add-On Services
- Head & Scalp Massage (15 min) - $25
- Foot & Calf Massage (15 min) - $25
- Neck & Shoulder Focus (15 min) - $30
- Aromatherapy Enhancement - $15
- Hot Stone Add-On - $20
- Thai Stretching (15 min) - $30

## Specializations

- Traditional Thai Massage techniques
- Sports therapy and athletic recovery
- Deep tissue work for chronic pain
- Stress relief and relaxation
- Office worker tension relief (tech neck, repetitive strain)
- Senior-friendly gentle massage
- Prenatal massage for expectant mothers

## Target Audiences

- Athletes and runners seeking recovery
- Office professionals with desk-related tension
- Chronic pain sufferers
- Stress relief seekers
- Seniors needing gentle therapeutic touch
- Anyone seeking relaxation and wellness

## About the Therapist

Nami is a licensed massage therapist in San Diego specializing in blending traditional Thai massage techniques with modern sports therapy. Every session is personalized to address individual needs, whether for athletic recovery, chronic pain management, or deep relaxation.

## Unique Value Proposition

- Personalized one-on-one sessions (not a chain spa)
- Blend of ancient Thai techniques with modern sports therapy
- Private, calm studio environment in North Park
- Customized treatment plans for each client
- 5-star rated on Google Reviews
